extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Algorithms in computer program and J.A.R.V.I.S. (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) in Iron Man have a structured approach to problem-solving
extended_metaphor.algorithms: Algorithms break down a problem into smaller parts and use mathematical processes and patterns to guide the design and execution of a solution. They organize design steps as a series of well-defined instructions for consistent outcomes and ease of replication and optimization.
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._(just_a_rather_very_intelli: Similarly, J.A.R.V.I.S. in Iron Man breaks down complex tasks into manageable steps and utilizes a structured approach to organize and execute Tony Stark's commands efficiently. Just like algorithms, J.A.R.V.I.S. relies on well-defined instructions and patterns to achieve intelligent outcomes.
